column2: the breach had begun when the Davis cattle broke down the worn fence and demolished the Dun crop of corn
column3: and it widened when the Dun hogs found their way through an old water gap and rooted up a field of the Davis sweet potatoes. Several times similar depredations were repeated
column4: and then shotguns were used on both sides with telling effect. The climax was reached when John Dun eloped with Rebecca
column5: the only child of the Davises.The young couple were forbidden their respective homes
column6: though the farm they rented was scarce half a mile away
column7: and the weeks rolled into months without sign of their parents relenting.When Walter was born
